tr.td: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions.

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: EHDS model for Patient Summary body data elements (sections with descriptions in shorts)

short.value: Patient summary body model 3

definition.value: EHDS model for Patient Summary body data elements (sections with descriptions in shorts)

short.value: Section: Alerts. Information about substantial alerts or warnings that health professionals should be aware of.

definition.value: Section: Alerts. Information about substantial alerts or warnings that health professionals should be aware of.

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: Description of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.

definition.value: Description of medical alerts in textual format: any clinical information that is imperative to know so that the life or health of the patient does not come under threat.

short.value: Section: Allergies and intolerances

definition.value: Section: Allergies and intolerances

short.value: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)

definition.value: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)

short.value: Allergy or intolerance information

definition.value: Allergy or intolerance information

short.value: Section: Medical History. This section may provide both synthetic anamnesis (e.g. description of phases of the pathology as a chronological summary of clustered clinical information) and anecdotal evidence that clinicians can collect from the patient, and can read in a narrative form.

definition.value: Section: Medical History. This section may provide both synthetic anamnesis (e.g. description of phases of the pathology as a chronological summary of clustered clinical information) and anecdotal evidence that clinicians can collect from the patient, and can read in a narrative form.

short.value: Problems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)

definition.value: Problems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)

short.value: Narrative description of past problems.

definition.value: Narrative description of past problems.

short.value: Section: Immunisations. The primary purpose is to enable communication of a patient's immunization status. The section should include current immunization status and may contain the entire immunization history that is relevant to the period of time being summarized. Adverse reactions against vaccines should be documented in the allergy section.

definition.value: Section: Immunisations. The primary purpose is to enable communication of a patient's immunization status. The section should include current immunization status and may contain the entire immunization history that is relevant to the period of time being summarized. Adverse reactions against vaccines should be documented in the allergy section.

short.value: Immunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.

definition.value: Immunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.

short.value: Section: Current medical problems. Conditions that are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

definition.value: Section: Current medical problems. Conditions that are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.

definition.value: Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.

short.value: Section: Medical devices and implants

definition.value: Section: Medical devices and implants

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: Describes the patient’s implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.

definition.value: Describes the patient’s implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.

short.value: Section: Procedures

definition.value: Section: Procedures

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: Major procedures.

definition.value: Major procedures.

short.value: Section: Medication Summary. Current and relevant past medicine.

definition.value: Section: Medication Summary. Current and relevant past medicine.

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.

definition.value: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.

short.value: Section: Functional status

definition.value: Section: Functional status

short.value: An individual’s ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being

definition.value: An individual’s ability to perform normal daily activities required to meet basic needs, fulfil usual roles and maintain health and well-being

short.value: Section: Social history. Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.

definition.value: Section: Social history. Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.

short.value: Textual description of the social history.

definition.value: Textual description of the social history.

short.value: Social history observations related to health

definition.value: Health related lifestyle factors or lifestyle observations and social determinants of health. Example: cigarette smoker, alcohol consumption

short.value: Section: Pregnancy history

definition.value: Section: Pregnancy history

short.value: Current pregnancy status

definition.value: Current pregnancy status

short.value: Current state at the date the observation was made: e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown

definition.value: Current state at the date the observation was made: e.g. pregnant, not pregnant, unknown

short.value: Expected date of delivery

definition.value: Date on which the woman is due to give birth.

short.value: History of previous pregnancies

definition.value: History of previous pregnancies

short.value: Previous pregnancies status: Yes, previous pregnancies; No, previous pregnancies; Unknown

definition.value: Previous pregnancies status: Yes, previous pregnancies; No, previous pregnancies; Unknown

short.value: Previous pregnancy's descriptions in detail

definition.value: Previous pregnancy's descriptions in detail

short.value: Outcome of the pregnancy

definition.value: Outcome of the pregnancy

short.value: Number of children/fetuses in this specific pregnancy

definition.value: Number of children/fetuses in this specific pregnancy

short.value: Section: Patient provided data

definition.value: Section: Patient provided data

short.value: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

definition.value: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

short.value: Country code

definition.value: Country code

short.value: Date of entry and departure

definition.value: Date of entry and departure

short.value: Section: Advance Directives. Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions.

definition.value: Section: Advance Directives. Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions.

short.value: May take the form of a reference to a legal document (e.g., Living Will) or an external textual description.

definition.value: May take the form of a reference to a legal document (e.g., Living Will) or an external textual description.

short.value: Section: Observation results. Relevant observation results obtained on the patient. These may be measurements, laboratory results, anatomic pathology results, radiology results or other imaging or clinical results.

definition.value: Section: Observation results. Relevant observation results obtained on the patient. These may be measurements, laboratory results, anatomic pathology results, radiology results or other imaging or clinical results.

short.value: Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments

definition.value: Observation results pertaining to the subject of care's health condition and which might have impact on future treatments

short.value: Section: Care plans. Therapeutic recommendations that do not include pharmacologic treatments, such as diet, physical exercise, planned surgeries

definition.value: Section: Care plans. Therapeutic recommendations that do not include pharmacologic treatments, such as diet, physical exercise, planned surgeries

short.value: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.

definition.value: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.
